text: Costa Rica competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich, West Germany. Three competitors, all men, took part in four events in three sports. ==Athletics== Men's 10,000 metres * Rafael Ángel Pérez ** Round 1 -- 29:36.6 min (→ 13th in heat, did not advance) ==Judo== Men's Half-Heavyweight *Roberto Solorzano ==Shooting== One shooter represented Costa Rica in 1972. ;50 m rifle, three positions * Hugo Chamberlain ;50 m rifle, prone * Hugo Chamberlain ==References== ==External links== *Official Olympic Reports Category:Nations at the 1972 Summer Olympics 1972 Summer Olympics Category:1972 in Costa Rica
title: Costa Rica at the 1972 Summer Olympics
